#Troubleshooting guide for connector installers.

*Problem Statement 1*

Tomcat fails to start when connector is installed on 64-bit windows using installer.

*Solution*

     Check if the file "msvrc71.dll" is present in windows\system directory 

     if the file is not present then copy the msvcr71.dll included in JDK 1.6 to
     windows\system directory
